hadiths.text: Abd al-Rahman b. Muhariz said: We asked Fadalah b. 'Ubaid about the hanging the (amputated) hand on the neck of a thief whether it was a sunnan. He said: A thief was brought to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and his hand was cut off. Thereafter he commanded for it, and it was hung on his neck

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي السَّارِقِ تُعَلَّقُ يَدُهُ فِي عُنُقِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Hanging the thief's hand around his neck
